biotools.summary: Flexible Open-Source Platform for High-Resolution Pupillometry in Vision Research. PupilEXT can record eye images using a stereo camera system or a single camera to measure the pupil diameter in real-time. Additionally, it is possible to analyse externally-recorded images without connected cameras through the PupilEXT interface.

bioschemas.name: PupilEXT
